1332.name: Ni-Rod FM 99
1332.Applications: Ni 99 is developed for welding ductile, grey and malleable cast irons. Ni 99 can also be used for dissimilar welding between cast iron and low alloyed steel or carbon steels.
1332.Suitable_For: Welding ductile, grey and malleable cast irons. Ni 99 can also be used for dissimilar welding between cast iron and low alloyed steel or carbon steels to prefend problems in the heat effected zone. (HAZ)
